| -------------------- | ------------------ | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |

| `dismissDuration`    | `dismiss-duration` |             | `string`                                          | `"medium"`  |
| `label` _(required)_ | `label`            |             | `string`                                          | `undefined` |
| `type`               | `type`             |             | `"danger" \| "primary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'primary'` |
